snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Get another look at gameplay, story, characters and their abilities, and the world of SteamWorld Heist 2 in this new trailer for the upcoming turn-based 2D strategy game sequel. SteamWorld Heist 2 will be available on Nintendo Switch, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Steam Deck, and PC via Steam on August 8, 2024.
